snippet: Apple said Beyoncé’s surprise release last week was the fastest-selling album in iTunes history, reaching No. 1 in the sales rankings in 104 countries.
abstract: Apple says Beyonce’s surprise album release was the fastest-selling album in iTunes history, reaching No. 1 in the sales rankings in 104 countries; it sold 828,777 copies in first three days, including 617,213 in United States.
lead_paragraph: Apple said Beyoncé’s surprise release last week was the fastest-selling album in iTunes history, reaching No. 1 in the sales rankings in 104 countries.

headline.main: Apple Says ‘Beyoncé’ Set a Record on iTunes
headline.print_headline: Apple Says ‘Beyoncé’ Set a Record On iTunes
